Niki Karanikola

M.S., Info Science and Info Systems, Cornell University, Cornell Tech

Women In Data Science Ambassador

NYC AI Reading Group Organizer

Hello! I'm Niki. This is a space where I document my journey learning all things AI. I write about my weekly learnings, experiments, and thoughts on the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence.

I hope my notes and posts can be helpful to others starting their own journey.
